item.title: By: Kevin Pettitt
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pettitt
item.description: <p>Hey Matt! Long time to talk...anyway I'm finally blogging myself, slowing figuring out RSS (so I can raise the average), and about to go downstairs and watch tonight's Daily Show before my nap. 'Tis my favorite show.</p><p>Cheers!</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hey Matt! Long time to talk…anyway I’m finally blogging myself, slowing figuring out RSS (so I can raise the average), and about to go downstairs and watch tonight’s Daily Show before my nap. ‘Tis my favorite show.

Cheers!
